alert.note: Alert for Douglas; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Fayette, southeastern Douglas, north central Coweta and southwestern Fulton Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Chattahoochee Hills, or 7 miles southwest of City of South Fulton, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Douglasville, City of South Fulton, Union City, Fairburn, Tyrone, Palmetto, Chattahoochee Hills, Chapel Hill, Dunaway Gardens, Cannongate, Campbellton, Roscoe, Thomas Crossroads and Madras. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
